name: skinny john's SLAM DUNK Art challenge
name_original: skinny john's SLAM DUNK Art challenge
description:
skinny john just challenged you on his slam dunk art challenge. Will you create a beautiful painting? Or will you create nonsense? Probably the latter...

Score all paint basketballs with slam dunks in the shortest time possible!  Post your record on the forums™.

Each color must go into their corresponding bucket.

FULL SCREEN IS RECOMMENDED

You can only grab a ball while jumping.

Controls:

  • Move with A/D or arrow keys.
  • Jump and double jump with W, up arrow key or spacebar.
  • Slow down time with the right mouse button.
  • While airborne, go for the dunk by holding, aiming, and releasing the left mouse button (you can't score otherwise).
  • Hold R for a second to restart.

Tips:

  • Jump when landing to re-grab the ball.
  • You can slowdown the game whenever you want, but the timer will not be affected!
  • You can shoot without slowing down time, but it'll be harder to aim.

Credits:

  • I made this :)
  • Developed in Godot Engine
  • Sound effects:
    • Applause 2.aif by lchapman1980
    • Comedic Whistle, B.wav by InspectorJ
    • 2 High Quality Explosions by Michel Baradari
    • Grey Sector (8-Bit) by FoxSynergy
    • Other sound effects made with Bfxr

Made for the KO!! Slam-Jam
